name: shell-bell
effect: Held: Heals the holder by 1/8 of any damage it inflicts.
short_effect: Held: Holder receives 1/8 of the damage it deals when attacking.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder’s HP is restored a little every time it inflicts damage.
flavor_text.platinum: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder’s HP is restored a little every time it inflicts damage.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder’s HP is restored a little every time it inflicts damage.
